page.title: 04INTERVIEW THE DAVIES,ASTLEY
page.content: Mr and Mrs Davies are an old couple,both aged about 70 and have no children.They have lived in Old Arley for over 18 years.Their home is actually the church-school which has been converted. They used to work as self-employed hairdressers and had a shop in Nuneaton. In their spare time they walk, work in their garden,grow vegetables and fruit,and Mrs Davies knits and sews.Mr and Mrs Davies had a pet dog but it died of old age.They watch television and like the theatre, but not public houses. The house itself was built with the church in 1287,and the colliery started the school when families came for jobs.Mr and Mrs Davies chose to live in Old Arley because they wanted to move away from town life and live in the countryside.
